Detailed Description

Wraps Lua scripting functionality.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum CLuaScriptHandler::ScriptResults
 

An enumeration of the possible results of DoLuaScript() and DoLuaFile().

Can be translated into text using GetResult().

Enumeration values:
eSuccess 
eFileError 
eSyntaxError 
eMemoryError 
eError
